content: The total outstanding balance of financing transactions we facilitated decreased from CNY 46.7 billion as of December 31, 2021, to CNY 25.6 billion as of December 31, 2022. As of December 31, 2022, the accumulated page views and unique visitors on Cango U-Car mini-program were over 410,000 and 23,000, respectively.
